text: Chesire is a town in New Haven County, Connecticut. The population was 28,733 in 2020. It is the center of population for the state of Connecticut. In 2009, Chesire was ranked #72 in Money magazine's "100 Best Places to Live". In 2011, Chesire was ranked #73 in Moneys "100 Best Places to Live". == References == Category:Towns in Connecticut Category:1694 establishments Category:1690s establishments in Connecticut Category:1780 establishments in North America Category:1780s establishments in Connecticut
title: Cheshire, Connecticut
